ygData.subject: Re: Financial Aid
ygData.msgSnippet: Honestly, it s a great idea.  Unfortunately, it takes SO much cash, that you ll have a problem convincing someone to do it. Here s what I do:  Go wisp hunting.
ygData.messageBody:
Honestly, it's a great idea. Unfortunately, it takes SO much cash, that
you'll have a problem convincing someone to do it.

Here's what I do: Go wisp hunting. I have a necro that I team up with
in the East and Wect commons. At 8th level (maybe 4th too, I'm not
sure) Enchanter pets can hit magic. :) With two spellcasters, and two
pets, as long as you can pull the wisps one at a time, you shouldn't
have any problems. Also, pulling to a predesignated spot is great,
because then as long as your partner can watch you incoming, he can tell
you if there's anything else on you. Good incase you start a train,
then you can zone right away. :)

Bukaru, Teir'Dal Enchanter, Test Server.
